title.zh: 血友姐妹会大创项目获评国家级立项
title.en: Hemophilia Sisters Innovation Project Approved as National-Level Project

description.zh: 血友姐妹会大创项目「中国血友病女性携带者基因检测、凝血因子与出血情况的调查和分析」在华中科技大学获评国家级学科交叉大学生创新创业实践训练项目立项。该项目聚焦血友病女性携带者的基因检测、凝血因子水平和出血症状，通过跨学科研究方法，为血友病女性关爱提供科学依据和实践支持。
description.en: The Hemophilia Sisters innovation project 'Investigation and Analysis of Genetic Testing, Coagulation Factors, and Bleeding Conditions of Female Hemophilia Carriers in China' was approved as a National-Level Interdisciplinary Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training Project at Huazhong University of Science and Technology. The project focuses on genetic testing, coagulation factor levels, and bleeding symptoms of female hemophilia carriers, providing scientific evidence and practical support for hemophilia women's care through interdisciplinary research methods.
